import React from 'react' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css'; import './formStyle.css' import { useFormik } from 'formik'; import * as yup from 'yup' import axios from 'axios'; import { useState } from 'react'; const Loginform = () => { const [success, setSuccess] = useState(null) const [error, setError] = useState(null) const formik = useFormik({ initialValues: { username: '', email: '', password: '', confirm_password: '' }, validateOnBlur: true, // onSubmit, // validationSchema: validationSchema }) return (

Welcome BACK!

Fill in the data below.

{success ? success : error}
{formik.touched.username && formik.errors.username ? formik.errors.username : ""}
{formik.touched.email && formik.errors.email ? formik.errors.email : ""}
{formik.touched.password && formik.errors.password ? formik.errors.password : ""}
{formik.touched.confirm_password && formik.errors.confirm_password ? formik.errors.confirm_password : ""}
) } export default Loginform
